name: .ASMX File Extension
summary: Learn about .ASMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Defines web services called by an Active Server Page (.ASP file); automatically compiled by ASP.NET when a request to the service is made; can be accessed over the Internet or from a local network.

content: ASMX files begin with the ASP.NET directive "WebService," followed by the "Language" parameter. This is used to set the programming language to Visual Basic, C#, or JScript. They can be run using a Windows-based web server with the .NET framework.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
